climatePledgeFriendly.details: The Forest Stewardship Council certified products support responsible forestry, helping keep forests healthy for future generations.

features: 18 CUBE BOXES: Each box of Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft contains 60 tissues—packaging may vary from what is shown.
SOFT FACIAL TISSUE: America’s #1 preferred Ultra Tissue (vs Ultra national brands) softly comforts skin with 3 thick layers.
3-LAYER FACIAL TISSUE: 3 thick layers to comfort face and help protect hands for everyday use and during allergy season, back-to-school season, and cold and flu season.
HYPOALLERGENIC FACIAL TISSUE: Each box of hypoallergenic facial tissues has designs that can fit your home—contains various colors and designs.
GET FACIAL TISSUES DELIVERED: Skip the store and get Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft delivered right to your door.
body.description: Tissues may be soft, but there’s only one Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft—made with three thick layers for a perfect balance of softness and strength. Whether it's for cold and flu season, pollen allergies, or everything in between you'll have plenty for everyone with Kleenex Expressions Ultra Soft with 18 cube boxes of 60 ultra soft tissues. Designed for runny noses and watery eyes, our lotion-free and dye-free tissues have no added fragrance and feature soft, strong and absorbent care for face and hands. Plus, you can find a tissue box that’s attractive for your home in various colors and designs. 100% of our pulp is from responsibly managed forests. Want to nourish your skin? Try Kleenex Soothing Lotion Facial Tissues with Coconut Oil, Aloe and Vitamin E.

L x W x H Cube Box. 4.5" x 4.375" x 5" What is the ply count for each type of Kleenex Facial Tissue? Ultra Soft: 3-Ply Where are Kleenex facial tissues manufactured? The Kleenex Brand tissues you know and love are proudly made in the USA— South Carolina, Connecticut, Oklahoma—and Ontario, Canada. Are Kleenex sustainable? We support forestry practices that help conserve valuable forestlands, respect fundamental human rights and ensure a thriving ecosystem and a sustainable source of wood fiber for the future—100% of our pulp is from responsibly managed forests.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super soft tissue
reviews.reviewText: Great purchase! Box came sealed and clean to my doorstep. Tissue boxes look good and will come into good use. 18 boxes, excellent deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These tissues are very soft & strong! How convenient to have them delivered right to my house! Great value & convenience!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Softest, hands down!
reviews.reviewText: In our house full of allergy sufferers , we could not survive if it were not for Kleenex. We keep a box in most rooms, they are strong enough WITHOUT being rough. Super Soft and will not rub skin.Always a Kleenex family!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This particular selection is the best one of this brand. Strong enough to withstand a man's blowing and soft enough my grandbabies don't cry. I will continue to purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Each box almost feels empty when you open it?
reviews.reviewText: I'm going to suggest looking closer than I did because I just researched How many Kleenex should be in a new box? I saw different results but this one has the Least number at 45 so I'm kind if crabby because I just opened a box and, granted I use more than most people I've never gone through a whole box this fast and it finally dawned on me so I got an unopened box and it really did feel almost empty. I've never experienced this before but am unsure if I've just never purchased this exact bulk package before or if they have started selling them with fewer tissues per box? THESE have 45 which isn't that many really. The ones I saw when comparing had 56 or 65 tissues per box and I only compared this to other Kleenex Brand tissues but with a different designs on the box (I liked them better) This only applies to the Kleenex Corp & this is just my perspective: This design is bright colorful & pretty but it's a bit difficult to blend them in with a majority of my interiors which are pretty colorful. A teeeeeny bit more neutral would be my suggestion but don't get me wrong here. I think the design is pretty. Love Kleenex & am very close to going through a box in 5 days & I've got a box here & there, maybe 6' apart (2 small rooms) and they run out simultaneously! Aaaachoo! Bless You

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The BEST tissues - very soft!
reviews.reviewText: This is the best tissue, but I am not crazy about the reduced box size and the reduced amount of tissues in the box. I would be more than happy to pay a higher price for the previous package size, with the previous amount of tissues.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Kleenex is the only tissue I would buy! It’s the softest biggest more absorbing thing other brands. Love the tissues

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024

reviews.reviewText: Great value for all of these boxes of tissues. I really like this brand and support this brand. They're thick but not stiff, soft but not thin and/or fragile. They are just right.
Love the tissues. Did not get them in bright boxes though!
3 plis, le mouchoir contient bien ce que le nez éjecte. Pas de doigt collant. Merci

reviews.reviewTitle: These are a great size for my car & small apartment
reviews.reviewText: These are good value for money if you take into account the number of sheets. I like them for use in my car console and apartment because of the small footprint of the boxes. The Kleenex are strong and soft.
